content: direct link to pattern pdf 1 pattern is entirely in japanese but charted this pattern has instructions for two different covers a and b **gauge** no gauge is listed in the pattern gauge and actual number of stitches cast on as well as row crocheted will depend on the size of the bottle you use **materials** * japanese size 5/0 and 6/0 3 0 and 3 5 mm crochet hooks * for bottle cover a approx 10g 42 meters yarn * for bottle cover a approx 15g 63 meters yarn * bottle or vase 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/kyudo/514/bottlecover pdf
